snippet.title: Maintenance Required - Reveal Trailer
snippet.description:
Demo available now on Steam and on itch!
https://store.steampowered.com/app/2794340/Maintenance_Required/

This is a project I've been working on for quite some time.

Maintenance Required is a horror game where your job to check up on an "edutainment" game that was reported to be having some issues. Collect items, catch and battle monsters, and work through puzzles. Just be careful, though, because you never know what may be lurking around the corner.

#MaintenanceRequired #MaintenanceRequiredGame
